titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit advanced refunding of private activity bonds with general obligation bonds if the governmental issuer takes over the private activity bond due to failure of the private entity.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/3/2000--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the exemption from Federal income tax of interest on a bond if, as of the date of the bond being refunded, the bond would not be classified as a private activity bond.
